data.title: Zurich climate: Weather Zurich & temperature by month
data.text:
>>Weather by month // weather averages Zurich

>>Climate graph // Weather by Month Zurich

>>average temperature by month Zurich

>>Weather Zurich

The climate in Zurich is warm and temperate. There is significant rainfall throughout the year in Zurich. Even the driest month still has a lot of rainfall. According to Köppen and Geiger, this climate is classified as Cfb. The mean yearly temperature observed in Zurich is recorded to be 9.7 °C | 49.4 °F. The rainfall here is around 1463 mm | 57.6 inch per year.

Zurich are in the northern hemisphere. Summer starts here at the end of June and ends in September. There are the months of summer: June, July, August, September.

Climate graph // Weather by Month Zurich

The driest month is February, with 90 mm | 3.5 inch of rain. Most precipitation falls in July, with an average of 152 mm | 6.0 inch.

average temperature by month Zurich

July is the warmest month of the year. The temperature in July averages 18.8 °C | 65.9 °F. In January, the average temperature is 0.9 °C | 33.6 °F. It is the lowest average temperature of the whole year.

Weather by month // weather averages Zurich

<>

Avg. Temperature °C (°F) Min. Temperature °C (°F) Max. Temperature °C (°F) Precipitation / Rainfall mm (in) Humidity (%) Rainy days (d) avg. Sun hours (hours)

January February March April May June July August September October November December

Data: 1991 - 2021 Min. Temperature °C (°F), Max. Temperature °C (°F), Precipitation / Rainfall mm (in), Humidity, Rainy days. Data: 1999 - 2019: avg. Sun hours

There is a difference of 62 mm | 2 inch of precipitation between the driest and wettest months. The average temperatures vary during the year by 18.0 °C | 32.3 °F.

The month with the highest relative humidity is November (82.94 %). The month with the lowest relative humidity is April (68.82 %). The month with the highest number of rainy days is May (15.73 days). The month with the lowest number of rainy days is February (12.00 days).

Zurich weather and climate for every month

Hours of sunshine in Zurich

avg. hours of sun

Total hours of sun

In Zurich, the month with the most daily hours of sunshine is July with an average of 10.72 hours of sunshine. In total there are 332.3 hours of sunshine throughout July.

The month with the fewest daily hours of sunshine in Zurich is January with an average of 4.51 hours of sunshine a day. In total there are 139.71 hours of sunshine in January.

Around 2700.66 hours of sunshine are counted in Zurich throughout the year. On average there are 88.65 hours of sunshine per month.

Airport close to Zurich

The closest Airports of Zurich are: Zurich Airport (ZRH) 9.26km,EuroAirport Basel-Mulhouse-Freiburg (BSL) 79.97km,Bern Airport (BRN) 93.44km

You can reach Zurich from this Cities by Plane: London (LCY), Athens (ATH), Ljubljana (LJU), Copenhagen (CPH), Mumbai (BOM), New Delhi (DEL), Vienna (VIE), Paris (CDG), Birmingham (BHX), Edinburgh (EDI), Toronto (YYZ), Lyon (LYS), Hamburg (HAM), Cologne (CGN), Oslo (OSL), Bremen (BRE), Graz (GRZ), Alicante (ALC), Málaga (AGP), Beijing (PEK)
